      • sauvegarde

        public void sauvegarde(EnumSauvegarde type,
                       java.lang.String param_victoire_defaite,
                       java.lang.String[][] param_grille_de_jeu,
                       java.lang.String param_pseudo_vainqueur)
                throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Manage the game save or history.
        Parameters:
        type - The save type.
        param_victoire_defaite - The game result for the player saving the game.
        param_grille_de_jeu - The game grid configuration at game end.
        param_pseudo_vainqueur - The winner pseudo.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the json process goes wrong.

                       throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Manage the game save.
        Parameters:
        param_pseudo_moi - The pseudo of the player saving the game.
        param_pseudo_adversaire - The pseudo of his opponent.
        param_victoire_defaite - The game result for the player saving the game.
        param_grille_de_jeu - The game grid configuration at game end.
        param_pseudo_vainqueur - The winner pseudo.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the json process goes wrong.
